mc.name: Aladdin's Ring
mc.oracleText: {8}, {T}: Aladdin's Ring deals 4 damage to target creature or player.
mc.printedText: {8}, {T}: Aladdin's Ring deals 4 damage to target creature or player.
mc.flavorText:
". . . The magician drew a ring off his finger . . . , saying: --'It is a talisman against all evil, so long as you obey me.'"
--The Arabian Nights,
Junior Classics trans.

mc.name: Amulet of Kroog
mc.oracleText: {2}, {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.
mc.printedText: {2}, {T}: Prevent 1 damage to any creature or player.
mc.flavorText: Among the first allies Urza gained were the people of Kroog. As a sign of friendship, Urza gave the healers of the city potent amulets; afterwards, thousands journeyed to Kroog in hope of healing.

mc.name: Ankh of Mishra
mc.oracleText: Whenever a land comes into play, Ankh of Mishra deals 2 damage to that land's controller.
mc.printedText: Whenever a land comes into play, Ankh of Mishra deals 2 damage to that land's controller.
mc.flavorText: Tawnos finally cracked the puzzle: the strange structures did not house Mishra's malevolent creations but were themselves among his creations.

mc.name: Ashnod's Altar
mc.oracleText: Sacrifice a creature: Add {2} to your mana pool.
mc.printedText: Sacrifice a creature: Add two colorless mana to your mana pool. Play this ability as a mana source.
mc.flavorText: The Brothers' War scarred the land, but Ashnod left her mark in the bloodlines of those she tortured.

mc.name: Ashnod's Transmogrant
mc.oracleText: {T}, Sacrifice Ashnod's Transmogrant: Put a +1/+1 counter on target nonartifact creature. That creature becomes an artifact in addition to its other types.
mc.printedText: {T}, Sacrifice Ashnod's Transmogrant: Put a +1/+1 counter on target nonartifact creature. That creature becomes an artifact creature permanently.
mc.flavorText: Ashnod found few willing to trade their humanity for the power she offered.

mc.name: Barbed Sextant
mc.oracleText: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Barbed Sextant: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
mc.printedText: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Barbed Sextant: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. Play this ability as a mana source. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn.

mc.name: Barl's Cage
mc.oracleText: {3}: Target creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
mc.printedText: {3}: Target creature does not untap during its controller's next untap phase.
mc.flavorText: For a dozen years the cage had held Lord Ith, but as the Pretender Mairsil's power weakened, so did the bars.

mc.name: Battering Ram
mc.oracleText:
At the beginning of your combat phase, Battering Ram gains banding until end of combat.
Whenever Battering Ram becomes blocked by a Wall, destroy that Wall at end of combat.
mc.printedText:
Banding when attacking
If Battering Ram is blocked by any Wall, destroy that Wall at end of combat.
mc.flavorText: By the time Mishra was defeated, no mage was foolish enough to rely heavily on walls.

mc.name: Bottle of Suleiman
mc.oracleText: {1}, Sacrifice Bottle of Suleiman: Flip a coin. If you lose the flip, Bottle of Suleiman deals 5 damage to you. If you win the flip, put a 5/5 Djinn artifact creature token with flying into play.
mc.printedText: {1}, Sacrifice Bottle of Suleiman: Flip a coin; target opponent calls heads or tails while coin is in the air. If the flip ends up in opponent's favor, Bottle of Suleiman deals 5 damage to you. Otherwise, put a Djinn token into play. Treat this token as a 5/5 artifact creature with flying.

mc.name: Clay Statue
mc.oracleText: {2}: Regenerate Clay Statue.
mc.printedText: {2}: Regenerate
mc.flavorText: Tawnos won fame as Urza's greatest assistant. After he created these warriors, Urza ended his apprenticeship, promoting him directly to the rank of master.

mc.name: Clockwork Beast
mc.oracleText:
Clockwork Beast comes into play with seven +1/+0 counters on it.
At end of combat, if Clockwork Beast attacked or blocked this turn, remove a +1/+0 counter from it.
{X}, {T}: Put up to X +1/+0 counters on Clockwork Beast. This ability can't cause the total number of +1/+0 counters on Clockwork Beast to be greater than seven. Play this ability only during your upkeep.
mc.printedText:
When Clockwork Beast comes into play, put seven +1/+0 counters on it. At the end of any combat in which Clockwork Beast attacked or blocked, remove one of these counters.
{X}, {T}: Put X +1/+0 counters on Clockwork Beast. You may have no more than seven of of these counters on Clockwork Beast. Use this ability only during your upkeep.

mc.name: Clockwork Steed
mc.oracleText:
Clockwork Steed comes into play with four +1/+0 counters on it.
Clockwork Steed can't be blocked by artifact creatures.
At end of combat, if Clockwork Steed attacked or blocked this turn, remove a +1/+0 counter from it.
{X}, {T}: Put up to X +1/+0 counters on Clockwork Steed. This ability can't cause the total number of +1/+0 counters on Clockwork Steed to be greater than four. Play this ability only during your upkeep.
mc.printedText:
Clockwork Steed cannot be blocked by artifact creatures.
When Clockwork Steed comes into play, put four +1/+0 counters on it. At the end of any combat in which Clockwork Steed attacked or blocked, remove one of these counters.
{X}, {T}: Put X +1/+0 counters on Clockwork Steed. You may have no more than four of these counters on Clockwork Steed. Use this ability only during your upkeep.

mc.name: Colossus of Sardia
mc.oracleText:
Trample (If this creature would deal enough combat damage to its blockers to destroy them, you may have it deal the rest of its damage to defending player.)
Colossus of Sardia doesn't untap during your untap step.
{9}: Untap Colossus of Sardia. Play this ability only during your upkeep.
mc.printedText:
Trample
Colossus of Sardia does not untap during your untap phase.
{9}: Untap Colossus of Sardia. Use this ability only during your upkeep.
mc.flavorText: From the Sardian mountains wakes ancient doom: / Warrior born from a rocky womb.

mc.name: Coral Helm
mc.oracleText: {3}, Discard a card at random: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {3}, Discard a card at random: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

mc.name: Crown of the Ages
mc.oracleText: {4}, {T}: Attach target Aura attached to a creature to another creature.
mc.printedText: {4}, {T}: Move target enchantment from one creature to another. The enchantment's new target must be legal.

mc.name: Crystal Rod
mc.oracleText: Whenever a player plays a blue spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.
mc.printedText: {1}: Gain 1 life. Use this ability only when a blue spell is successfully cast and only once for each such spell.

mc.name: Dancing Scimitar
mc.oracleText: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying.)
mc.printedText: Flying
mc.flavorText: Bobbing merrily from opponent to opponent, the scimitar began adding playful little flourishes to its strokes; it even turned a couple of somersaults.

mc.name: Diabolic Machine
mc.oracleText: {3}: Regenerate Diabolic Machine.
mc.printedText: {3}: Regenerate
mc.flavorText:
"The bolts of our ballistae smashed into the monstrous thing, but our hopes died in our chests as its gears continued turning."
--Sevti Mukul, The Fall of Alsoor

mc.name: Dingus Egg
mc.oracleText: Whenever a land is put into a graveyard from play, Dingus Egg deals 2 damage to that land's controller.
mc.printedText: Whenever a land is put into any graveyard from play, Dingus Egg deals 2 damage to that land's controller.

mc.name: Disrupting Scepter
mc.oracleText: {3}, {T}: Target player discards a card. Play this ability only during your turn.
mc.printedText: {3}, {T}: Target player chooses and discards a card. Use this ability only during your turn.

mc.name: Dragon Engine
mc.oracleText: {2}: Dragon Engine gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {2}: +1/+0 until end of turn
mc.flavorText:
"How is it the legged engines seem so much more alive than their wheeled counterparts? Simply, they were born, not made."
--Mishra

mc.name: Elkin Bottle
mc.oracleText: {3}, {T}: Remove the top card of your library from the game. Until the beginning of your next upkeep, you may play that card. At the beginning of your next upkeep, if you haven't played the card, put it into your graveyard.
mc.printedText: {3}, {T}: Set the top card of your library aside face up. You may play that card as though it were in your hand. At the beginning of your next turn, bury the card if you have not played it.

mc.name: Feldon's Cane
mc.oracleText: {T}, Remove Feldon's Cane from the game: Shuffle your graveyard into your library.
mc.printedText: {T}, Remove Feldon's Cane from the game: Shuffle your graveyard into your library.
mc.flavorText: Feldon found the first of these canes frozen in the Ronom Glacier.

mc.name: Fellwar Stone
mc.oracleText: {T}: Add to your mana pool one mana of any color that a land an opponent controls could produce.
mc.printedText: {T}: Add to your mana pool one mana of any type that any opponent's lands can produce. Play this ability as a mana source.
mc.flavorText:
Throw stones, and throw away the world.
--Dwarven proverb

mc.name: Feroz's Ban
mc.oracleText: Creature spells cost {2} more to play.
mc.printedText: Summon spells cost an additional {2} to play.
mc.flavorText:
"Without the protection of Feroz's Ban, I fear the Homelands are lost."
--Daria

mc.name: Flying Carpet
mc.oracleText: {2}, {T}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {2}, {T}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn. If that creature is put into any graveyard this turn, bury Flying Carpet.

mc.name: Fountain of Youth
mc.oracleText: {2}, {T}: You gain 1 life.
mc.printedText: {2}, {T}: Gain 1 life.
mc.flavorText: The fountain had stood in the town square for centuries, but only the pigeons knew its secret.

mc.name: Gauntlets of Chaos
mc.oracleText: {5}, Sacrifice Gauntlets of Chaos: Exchange control of target artifact, creature, or land an opponent controls and a permanent you control if they share one of those types. Destroy all Auras attached to those permanents.
mc.printedText: {5}, Sacrifice Gauntlets of Chaos: Exchange control of target artifact, creature, or land you control for control of target permanent of the same type that an opponent controls. Bury all enchantments played on those permanents.

mc.name: Glasses of Urza
mc.oracleText: {T}: Look at target player's hand.
mc.printedText: {T}: Look at target player's hand.

mc.name: Grapeshot Catapult
mc.oracleText: {T}: Grapeshot Catapult deals 1 damage to target creature with flying.
mc.printedText: {T}: Grapeshot Catapult deals 1 damage to target creature with flying.
mc.flavorText: Recent research suggests these creatures were invented by Urza's and Mishra's original master, Tocasia, and that both brothers used them.

mc.name: Helm of Chatzuk
mc.oracleText: {1}, {T}: Target creature gains banding until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {1}, {T}: Target creature gains banding until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: Whether inspired by fear or by honor, all loyalty lends might.

mc.name: Howling Mine
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of each player's draw step, if Howling Mine is untapped, that player draws a card.
mc.printedText: During each player's draw phase, that player draws an additional card.

mc.name: Infinite Hourglass
mc.oracleText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a time counter on Infinite Hourglass.

All creatures get +1/+0 for each time counter on Infinite Hourglass.

{3}: Remove a time counter from Infinite Hourglass. Any player may play this ability but only during any upkeep step.
mc.printedText:
During your upkeep, put a time counter on Infinite Hourglass.
All creatures get +X/+0, where X is equal to the number of time counters on Infinite Hourglass.
Any player may pay {3} during any upkeep to remove a time counter from Infinite Hourglass.

mc.name: Iron Star
mc.oracleText: Whenever a player plays a red spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.
mc.printedText: {1}: Gain 1 life. Use this ability only when a red spell is successfully cast and only once for each such spell.

mc.oracleText: Whenever a player plays a white spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.
mc.printedText: {1}: Gain 1 life. Use this ability only when a white spell is successfully cast and only once for each such spell.

mc.oracleText: {1}: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to target creature this turn, that source deals that damage to you instead.
mc.printedText: {1}: Redirect all damage from any creature to yourself.

mc.name: Jalum Tome
mc.oracleText: {2}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
mc.printedText: {2}, {T}: Draw a card, then choose and discard a card.
mc.flavorText: This timeworn relic was responsible for many of Urza's victories, though he never fully comprehended its mystic runes.

mc.name: Jandor's Saddlebags
mc.oracleText: {3}, {T}: Untap target creature.
mc.printedText: {3}, {T}: Untap target creature.
mc.flavorText: Each day of their journey, Jandor opened the saddlebags and found them full of mutton, quinces, cheese, date rolls, wine, and all manner of delicious and satisfying foods.

mc.name: Jayemdae Tome
mc.oracleText: {4}, {T}: Draw a card.
mc.printedText: {4}, {T}: Draw a card.

mc.name: Jester's Cap
mc.oracleText: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Jester's Cap: Search target player's library for three cards and remove them from the game. Then that player shuffles his or her library.
mc.printedText: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Jester's Cap: Look through target player's library and remove any three of those cards from the game. Shuffle that library afterwards.
mc.flavorText:
"Know your foes' strengths as well as their weaknesses."
--Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi machinist

mc.name: Joven's Tools
mc.oracleText: {4}, {T}: Target creature can't be blocked this turn except by Walls.
mc.printedText: {4}, {T}: Target creature cannot be blocked this turn except by Walls.
mc.flavorText:
"If that thief Joven ever shows his head around here again, make sure he leaves without it."
--Eron the Relentless

mc.name: Library of Leng
mc.oracleText:
You have no maximum hand size.
If an effect causes you to discard a card, discard it, but you may put it on top of your library instead of into your graveyard.
mc.printedText:
Skip your discard phase.
Whenever a spell or effect forces you to discard a card, you may instead discard that card to the top of your library.

mc.name: Mana Vault
mc.oracleText:
Mana Vault doesn't untap during your untap step.

At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay {4}. If you do, untap Mana Vault.

At the beginning of your draw step, if Mana Vault is tapped, it deals 1 damage to you.

{T}: Add {3} to your mana pool.
mc.printedText:
Mana Vault does not untap during your untap phase.
At the end of your upkeep, if Mana Vault is tapped, it deals 1 damage to you.
{4}: Untap Mana Vault at end of upkeep. Use this ability only during your upkeep.
{T}: Add three colorless mana to your mana pool. Play this ability as a mana source.

mc.name: Meekstone
mc.oracleText: Creatures with power 3 or greater don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.
mc.printedText: Creatures with power 3 or greater do not untap during their controllers' untap phases.
mc.flavorText: When the mighty sleep, the lowly prowl.

mc.name: Millstone
mc.oracleText: {2}, {T}: Target player puts the top two cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
mc.printedText: {2}, {T}: Put the top two cards of target player's library into his or her graveyard.
mc.flavorText: More than one mage has been driven insane by the sound of the millstone relentlessly grinding away.

mc.name: Nevinyrral's Disk
mc.oracleText:
Nevinyrral's Disk comes into play tapped.
{1}, {T}: Destroy all artifacts, creatures, and enchantments.
mc.printedText:
Nevinyrral's Disk comes into play tapped.
{1}, {T}: Destroy all artifacts, creatures, and enchantments.

mc.name: Obelisk of Undoing
mc.oracleText: {6}, {T}: Return target permanent you own and control to your hand.
mc.printedText: {6}, {T}: Return target permanent you control and own to your hand.
mc.flavorText: The Battle of Tomakul taught Urza not to rely on fickle reinforcements.

mc.name: Ornithopter
mc.oracleText: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
mc.printedText: Flying
mc.flavorText:
"It has been my honor to improve on Thran's original design. Perhaps history will remember me in some small part for my work."
--Urza, in his apprenticeship

mc.name: Pentagram of the Ages
mc.oracleText: {4}, {T}: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.
mc.printedText: {4}, {T}: Prevent all damage to you from one source. Treat further damage from that source normally.
mc.flavorText: A mirror, a shield, a promise, a great distance, and a kind word--five ways to avoid harm.

mc.name: Primal Clay
mc.oracleText: Primal Clay comes into play as your choice of a 3/3 artifact creature, a 2/2 artifact creature with flying, or a 1/6 Shapeshifter Wall artifact creature with defender.
mc.printedText: When you play Primal Clay, choose one--Primal Clay is a 2/2 artifact creature with flying; or Primal Clay is a 3/3 artifact creature; or Primal Clay is a 1/6 artifact creature that counts as a Wall.

mc.name: Rod of Ruin
mc.oracleText: {3}, {T}: Rod of Ruin deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
mc.printedText: {3}, {T}: Rod of Ruin deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

mc.name: Serpent Generator
mc.oracleText: {4}, {T}: Put a 1/1 Snake artifact creature token into play. This creature has "Whenever this creature deals damage to a player, that player gets a poison counter." (A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game.)
mc.printedText: {4}, {T}: Put a Poison Snake token into play. Treat this token as a 1/1 artifact creature. If any Poison Snake damages any player, he or she gets a poison counter. If any player has ten or more poison counters, he or she loses the game.

mc.name: Shapeshifter
mc.oracleText:
As Shapeshifter comes into play, choose a number between 0 and 7.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may choose a number between 0 and 7.
Shapeshifter's power is equal to the last chosen number and its toughness is equal to 7 minus that number.
mc.printedText:
Shapeshifter has total power and toughness of 7, divided any way you choose, though neither can be more than 7.
When you play Shapeshifter, choose its power and toughness.
During your upkeep, choose Shapeshifter's power and toughness.

mc.name: Skull Catapult
mc.oracleText: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Skull Catapult deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
mc.printedText: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Skull Catapult deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
mc.flavorText:
"Let any who doubt the evil of using the ancient devices look at this infernal machine. What manner of fiend would design such a sadistic device?"
--Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi heretic

mc.name: Soul Net
mc.oracleText: Whenever a creature is put into a graveyard from play, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.
mc.printedText: {1}: Gain 1 life. Use this ability only when a creature is put into any graveyard from play and only once for each such creature.

mc.name: Tawnos's Weaponry
mc.oracleText:
You may choose not to untap Tawnos's Weaponry during your untap step.

{2}, {T}: Target creature gets +1/+1 as long as Tawnos's Weaponry remains tapped.
mc.printedText:
You may choose not to untap Tawnos's Weaponry during your untap phase.
{2}, {T}: Target creature gets +1/+1 as long as Tawnos's Weaponry remains tapped.
mc.flavorText: When war machines became too costly, Tawnos's weaponry replaced them.

mc.name: The Hive
mc.oracleText: {5}, {T}: Put a 1/1 Insect artifact creature token with flying named Wasp into play. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
mc.printedText: {5}, {T}: Put a Wasp token into play. Treat this token as a 1/1 artifact creature with flying.
mc.flavorText: Mouths and wings beyond numbering, but a single mind to guide them.

mc.name: Throne of Bone
mc.oracleText: Whenever a player plays a black spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.
mc.printedText: {1}: Gain 1 life. Use this ability only when a black spell is successfully cast and only once for each such spell.

mc.oracleText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a time counter on Time Bomb.

{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Time Bomb: Time Bomb deals damage to each creature and each player equal to the number of time counters on Time Bomb.
mc.printedText:
During your upkeep, put a time counter on Time Bomb.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Time Bomb: Time Bomb deals to each creature and player an amount of damage equal to the number of time counters on Time Bomb.

mc.name: Urza's Avenger
mc.oracleText: {0}: Urza's Avenger gets -1/-1 and gains your choice of banding, flying, first strike, or trample until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {0}: -1/-1 and your choice of banding, flying, first strike, or trample until end of turn
mc.flavorText: Unable to settle on just one design, Urza decided to create one versatile being.

mc.name: Urza's Bauble
mc.oracleText: {T}, Sacrifice Urza's Bauble: Look at a card at random in target player's hand. You draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
mc.printedText: {T}, Sacrifice Urza's Bauble: Choose a card at random from target player's hand and look at that card. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn.

mc.name: Wall of Spears
mc.oracleText:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
First strike
mc.printedText:
First strike
Wall of Spears counts as a Wall.
mc.flavorText: Even the most conservative generals revised their tactics after the Battle of Sarinth, during which a handful of peasant-pikeman held off a trio of rampaging craw wurms.

mc.name: Winter Orb
mc.oracleText: As long as Winter Orb is untapped, players can't untap more than one land during their untap steps.
mc.printedText: Players cannot untap more than one land during their untap phases.
mc.flavorText:
"When once winter has ahold,
Not willingly does she withdraw
her icy touch, wistfully caressing--
The deepened air sleeps its cold."
--Aline Corralurn, "Late Thaw"

mc.name: Wooden Sphere
mc.oracleText: Whenever a player plays a green spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.
mc.printedText: {1}: Gain 1 life. Use this ability only when a green spell is successfully cast and only once for each such spell.

mc.name: Abyssal Specter
mc.oracleText:
Flying
Whenever Abyssal Specter deals damage to a player, that player discards a card.
mc.printedText:
Flying
If Abyssal Specter damages any player, he or she chooses and discards a card.
mc.flavorText:
"Mystic shadow, bending near me, /
Who art thou? / Whence come ye?"
--Stephen Crane,
"Mystic shadow, bending near me"

mc.name: Animate Dead
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature card in a graveyard
When Animate Dead comes into play, if it's in play, it loses "enchant creature card in a graveyard" and gains "enchant creature put into play with Animate Dead." Return enchanted creature card to play under your control and attach Animate Dead to it. When Animate Dead leaves play, that creature's controller sacrifices it.
Enchanted creature gets -1/-0.
mc.printedText: When you play Animate Dead, choose target creature card in any graveyard. When Animate Dead comes into play, put that creature into play and Animate Dead becomes a creature enchantment that targets the creature. Enchanted creature gets -1/-0. If Animate Dead leaves play, bury the creature.

mc.name: Ashes to Ashes
mc.oracleText: Remove two target nonartifact creatures from the game. Ashes to Ashes deals 5 damage to you.
mc.printedText: Remove two target nonartifact creatures from the game. Ashes to Ashes deals 5 damage to you.
mc.flavorText:
"Kings and beggars, they end the same--
Surrounded by stench, rot, and blame."
--Aline Corralurn, "Legacy"

mc.name: Bad Moon
mc.oracleText: Black creatures get +1/+1.
mc.printedText: All black creatures get +1/+1.

mc.name: Black Knight
mc.oracleText:
First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
Protection from white (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything white.)
mc.printedText: First strike, protection from white
mc.flavorText: Battle doesn't need a purpose; the battle is its own purpose. You don't ask why a plague spreads or a field burns. Don't ask why I fight.

mc.name: Blight
mc.oracleText:
Enchant land
When enchanted land becomes tapped, destroy it.
mc.printedText: If enchanted land becomes tapped, destroy it at end of turn.

mc.name: Bog Imp
mc.oracleText: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying.)
mc.printedText: Flying
mc.flavorText: On guard for larger dangers, we underestimated the power and speed of the imp's muck-crusted claws.

mc.name: Bog Rats
mc.oracleText: Bog Rats can't be blocked by Walls.
mc.printedText: Bog Rats cannot be blocked by Walls.
mc.flavorText: Their stench was vile and strong enough, but not nearly as powerful as their hunger.

mc.name: Bog Wraith
mc.oracleText: Swampwalk (This creature is unblockable as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
mc.printedText: Swampwalk (If defending player controls any swamps, this creature is unblockable.)
mc.flavorText:
'Twas in the bogs of Cannelbrae
My mate did meet an early grave;
'Twas nothing left for us to save
In the peat-filled bogs of Cannelbrae.

mc.name: Breeding Pit
mc.oracleText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Breeding Pit unless you pay {B}{B}.
At the end of your turn, put a 0/1 black Thrull creature token into play.
mc.printedText:
During your upkeep, pay {B}{B} or bury Breeding Pit.
At the end of your turn, put a Thrull token into play. Treat this token as a 0/1 black creature.
mc.flavorText: The thrulls bred at a terrifying pace. In the end, they overwhelmed the Order of the Ebon Hand.

mc.name: Broken Visage

mc.printedText: Bury target nonartifact attacking creature and put a Shadow token into play. Treat this token as a black creature with the same power and toughness as that attacking creature. At end of turn, bury the token.

mc.name: Carrion Ants
mc.oracleText: {1}: Carrion Ants gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {1}: +1/+1 until end of turn
mc.flavorText: "War is no picnic," my father liked to say. But the ants seemed to disagree.

mc.name: Cloak of Confusion
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature attacks and isn't blocked, you may have it deal no combat damage this turn. If you do, defending player discards a card at random.
mc.printedText: {0}: Defending player discards a card at random. Enchanted creature deals no combat damage this turn. Use this ability only if enchanted creature is attacking and unblocked and only once each turn.

mc.name: Cursed Land
mc.oracleText:
Enchant land
At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted land's controller, Cursed Land deals 1 damage to that player.

mc.printedText: Counter target spell if it is red, or destroy target permanent if it is red. (If this spell targets a permanent, play it as an instant.)
mc.flavorText:
"Heed the lessons of our time: the forms of water may move the land itself and hold captive the fires within."
--Gustha Ebbasdotter,
Kjeldoran royal mage

mc.name: Juxtapose
mc.oracleText: You and target player exchange control of the creature you each control with the highest converted mana cost. Then exchange control of artifacts the same way. If two or more permanents a player controls are tied for highest cost, their controller chooses one of them.
mc.printedText: Exchange with target player control of the creature with the highest total casting cost that you each control. If two or more creatures are tied for highest total casting cost creature a player controls, he or she chooses between them. Exchange control of artifacts in the same way.

mc.name: Krovikan Sorcerer
mc.oracleText:
{T}, Discard a card: Draw a card.
{T}, Discard a black card: Draw two cards, then discard one of them.
mc.printedText:
{T}, Choose and discard a nonblack card: Draw a card.
{T}, Choose and discard a black card: Draw two cards, then choose and discard one of them.

mc.name: Labyrinth Minotaur
mc.oracleText: Whenever Labyrinth Minotaur blocks a creature, that creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
mc.printedText: If Labyrinth Minotaur blocks any creature, that creature does not untap during its controller's next untap phase.
mc.flavorText:
"I doubt any labyrinth minotaurs still live--but then we minotaurs are stubborn beings."
--Onatah, Anaba shaman

mc.name: Leviathan
mc.oracleText:
Trample
Leviathan comes into play tapped and doesn't untap during your untap step.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may sacrifice two Islands. If you do, untap Leviathan.
Leviathan can't attack unless you sacrifice two Islands.
mc.printedText:
Trample
Leviathan comes into play tapped and does not untap during your untap phase.
Leviathan cannot attack this turn unless you sacrifice two islands.
Sacrifice two islands: Untap Leviathan. Use this ability only during your upkeep.

mc.name: Lifetap
mc.oracleText: Whenever a Forest an opponent controls becomes tapped, you gain 1 life.
mc.printedText: Whenever any forest target opponent controls becomes tapped, gain 1 life.
mc.flavorText:
"Keep a green tree in your heart and perhaps the singing bird will come."
--Chinese proverb

mc.name: Lord of Atlantis
mc.oracleText: Other Merfolk creatures get +1/+1 and have islandwalk.
mc.printedText: All Merfolk get +1/+1 and gain islandwalk. (If defending player controls any islands, these creatures are unblockable.)
mc.flavorText:
"--'We have no legs,' the warrior spat, --'for we have finished running.'"
--Vodalian folktale

mc.name: Magical Hack
mc.oracleText: Change the text of target spell or permanent by replacing all instances of one basic land type with another. (For example, you may change "swampwalk" to "plainswalk.") (This effect doesn't end at end of turn.)
mc.printedText: Change the text of target permanent or spell by replacing all instances of one basic land type with another. (For example, you may change "swampwalk" to "plainswalk." If this spell targets a permanent, play it as an instant.)

mc.name: Magus of the Unseen
mc.oracleText: {1}{U}, {T}: Untap target artifact an opponent controls and gain control of it until end of turn. If it's an artifact creature, it gains haste until end of turn. When you lose control of the artifact, tap it.
mc.printedText: {1}{U}, {T}: Untap target artifact an opponent controls and gain control of it until end of turn. That artifact is unaffected by summoning sickness this turn. Tap the artifact if you lose control of it at end of this turn.

mc.name: Memory Lapse
mc.oracleText: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, put it on top of its owner's library instead of into that player's graveyard.
mc.printedText: Counter target spell. Put that spell on top of owner's library.
mc.flavorText:
"Oh, I had a conscience once. But alas, I seem to have forgotten where I put it."
--Chandler

mc.name: Merfolk of the Pearl Trident
mc.flavorText: Most human scholars believe that merfolk are the survivors of sunken Atlantis, humans adapted to the water. Merfolk, however, believe that humans sprang forth from merfolk who adapted themselves in order to explore their last frontier.

mc.name: Mind Bomb
mc.oracleText: Each player may discard up to three cards. Mind Bomb deals damage to each player equal to 3 minus the number of cards he or she discarded this way.
mc.printedText: Mind Bomb deals 3 damage to each player. Each player may choose and discard up to three cards to prevent that amount of damage to him or her from Mind Bomb.

mc.name: Phantasmal Forces
mc.oracleText:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Phantasmal Forces unless you pay {U}.
mc.printedText:
Flying
During your upkeep, pay {U} or bury Phantasmal Forces.
mc.flavorText: These beings embody the essence of true heroes long dead. Summoned from the dreamrealms, they rise to meet their enemies.

mc.name: Phantasmal Terrain
mc.oracleText:
Enchant land
As Phantasmal Terrain comes into play, choose a basic land type.
Enchanted land is the chosen type.
mc.printedText: Enchanted land is a basic land type of your choice.

mc.name: Phantom Monster
mc.oracleText: Flying
mc.printedText: Flying
mc.flavorText:
"While, like a ghastly rapid river,
Through the pale door,
A hideous throng rush out forever,
And laugh--but smile no more."
--Edgar Allan Poe,
"The Haunted Palace"

mc.name: Pirate Ship
mc.oracleText:
Pirate Ship can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.
{T}: Pirate Ship deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
When you control no Islands, sacrifice Pirate Ship.
mc.printedText:
Islandhome (If defending player controls no islands, this creature cannot attack. If you control no islands, bury this creature.)
{T}: Pirate Ship deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

mc.name: Portent
mc.oracleText:
Look at the top three cards of target player's library, then put them back in any order. You may have that player shuffle his or her library.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
mc.printedText: Look at the top three cards of target player's library. Shuffle that library or put those three cards back on top of it in any order. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn.

mc.name: Power Sink
mc.oracleText: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. If he or she doesn't, that player taps all lands he or she controls and empties his or her mana pool.
mc.printedText: Counter target spell unless that spell's caster pays an additional {X}. That player draws and pays all mana from lands and mana pool until {X} is paid; he or she may also draw and pay mana from other sources if desired.

mc.name: Prodigal Sorcerer
mc.oracleText: {T}: Prodigal Sorcerer deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
mc.printedText: {T}: Prodigal Sorcerer deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
mc.flavorText: Occasionally members of the Institute of Arcane Study acquire a taste for worldly pleasures. Seldom do they have trouble finding employment.

mc.name: Psychic Venom
mc.oracleText:
Enchant land
Whenever enchanted land becomes tapped, Psychic Venom deals 2 damage to that land's controller.
mc.printedText: Whenever enchanted land becomes tapped, Psychic Venom deals 2 damage to that land's controller.

mc.name: Ray of Command
mc.oracleText:
Untap target creature an opponent controls and gain control of it until end of turn. That creature gains haste until end of turn.

When you lose control of the creature, tap it.
mc.printedText: Untap target creature an opponent controls and gain control of it until end of turn. That creature is unaffected by summoning sickness this turn. Tap the creature if you lose control of it at end of this turn.

mc.name: Recall
mc.oracleText: Discard X cards, then return a card from your graveyard to your hand for each card discarded this way. Remove Recall from the game.
mc.printedText: Choose and discard X cards: Return X target cards in your graveyard to your hand. Remove Recall from the game.

mc.name: Reef Pirates
mc.oracleText: Whenever Reef Pirates deals damage to an opponent, that player puts the top card of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
mc.printedText: If Reef Pirates damages any opponent, put the top card of that player's library into his or her graveyard.
mc.flavorText: Relentless as the tides, souls dark as a moonless night. Bloodshed on their minds, and greed burning in their hearts like molten gold.

mc.name: Remove Soul
mc.oracleText: Counter target creature spell.
mc.printedText: Counter target summon spell.
mc.flavorText: Nethya stiffened suddenly, head cocked as if straining to hear some distant sound, then fell lifeless to the ground.

mc.name: Sea Serpent
mc.oracleText:
Sea Serpent can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.

When you control no Islands, sacrifice Sea Serpent.
mc.printedText: Islandhome (If defending player controls no islands, this creature cannot attack. If you control no islands, bury this creature.)
mc.flavorText: Legend has it that serpents used to be bigger, but how could that be?

mc.name: Sea Spirit
mc.oracleText: {U}: Sea Spirit gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {U}: +1/+0 until end of turn
mc.flavorText:
"It rose above our heads, above the ship, and still higher yet. No foggy, ice-laden sea in the world could frighten me more."
--General Jarkeld, the Arctic Fox

mc.name: Sea Sprite
mc.oracleText: Flying, protection from red
mc.printedText: Flying, protection from red
mc.flavorText:
"No one can catch what won't be caught."
--Kakra, sea troll

mc.name: Seasinger
mc.oracleText:
When you control no Islands, sacrifice Seasinger.
You may choose not to untap Seasinger during your untap step.
{T}: Gain control of target creature whose controller controls an Island as long as you control Seasinger and as long as Seasinger remains tapped.
mc.printedText:
If you control no islands, bury Seasinger.
You may choose not to untap Seasinger during your untap phase.
{T}: Gain control of target creature whose controller controls any islands as long as you control Seasinger and Seasinger remains tapped.

mc.name: Segovian Leviathan
mc.oracleText: Islandwalk
mc.printedText: Islandwalk (If defending player controls any islands, this creature is unblockable.)
mc.flavorText:
"Leviathan, too Can you catch him with a fish-hook or run a line round his tongue?"
The Bible, Job 41:1

mc.name: Sibilant Spirit
mc.oracleText:
Flying
Whenever Sibilant Spirit attacks, defending player may draw a card.
mc.printedText:
Flying
If Sibilant Spirit attacks, defending player may draw a card.
mc.flavorText: She had expected death to roar, to thunder, to growl. She did not recognize it when it came hissing to her side.

mc.name: Sleight of Mind
mc.oracleText: Change the text of target spell or permanent by replacing all instances of one color word with another. (For example, you may change "target black spell" to "target blue spell.") (This effect doesn't end at end of turn.)
mc.printedText: Change the text of target permanent or spell by replacing all instances of one color word with another. (For example, you may change "nongreen creature" to "nonred creature." If this spell targets a permanent, play it as an instant.)

mc.name: Soul Barrier
mc.oracleText: Whenever an opponent plays a creature spell, Soul Barrier deals 2 damage to that player unless he or she pays {2}.
mc.printedText: Whenever target opponent successfully casts a summon spell, Soul Barrier deals 2 damage to him or her. That player may pay {2} to prevent this damage.
mc.flavorText:
"The Soul selects her own Society--
Then--shuts the Door--"
--Emily Dickinson,
"The Soul selects her own Society"

mc.name: Spell Blast
mc.oracleText: Counter target spell with converted mana cost X.
mc.printedText: Counter target spell with total casting cost equal to X.

mc.printedText: Tap or untap target artifact, creature, or land.

Enchant creature

mc.name: Updraft

Target creature gains flying until end of turn.

Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
mc.printedText:
Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn.
mc.flavorText:
"Come one, come all this rock shall fly From its firm base as soon as I."
--Sir Walter Scott, "The Lady of the Lake"

mc.name: Vodalian Soldiers
mc.flavorText:
"Vodalian rank is displayed by the colors and patterns of their skin. Beware the color red; that is the badge of the empress's favor."
--Corbio, pearl diver

mc.oracleText: Defender, flying (This creature can't attack, and it can block creatures with flying.)
mc.printedText: Flying
mc.flavorText:
When no falcons fly, beware the sky.
--Femeref aphorism

mc.name: Wind Spirit

Flying
Wind Spirit can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.
mc.printedText:
Flying
Wind Spirit cannot be blocked by only one creature.
mc.flavorText:
" . . . When the trees bow down their heads, / The wind is passing by."
--Christina Rossetti,
"Who Has Seen the Wind?"

mc.name: Zephyr Falcon
mc.oracleText: Flying, vigilance
mc.printedText:
Flying
Attacking does not cause Zephyr Falcon to tap.
mc.flavorText: Although greatly prized among falconers, the zephyr falcon is capricious and not easily tamed.

mc.name: Zur's Weirding
mc.oracleText:
Players play with their hands revealed.
If a player would draw a card, he or she reveals it instead. Then any other player may pay 2 life. If a player does, put that card into its owner's graveyard. Otherwise, that player draws a card.
mc.printedText:
Players play with their hands face up.
Whenever any player draws a card, any other player may pay 2 life to force the drawing player to discard that card.

mc.name: An-Havva Constable
mc.oracleText: An-Havva Constable's toughness is equal to 1 plus the number of green creatures in play.
mc.printedText: An-Havva Constable has toughness equal to 1 plus the number of green creatures in play.
mc.flavorText:
"Joskun and the other constables serve with passion, if not with grace."
--Devin, faerie noble

mc.name: Aspect of Wolf

Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +X/+Y, where X is equal to half the number of Forests you control, rounded down, and Y is equal to half the number of Forests you control, rounded up.
mc.printedText: Enchanted creature gets +*/+*, where * is equal to half the number of forests you control, rounded down for power and up for toughness.

mc.name: Aurochs
mc.oracleText:
Trample
Whenever Aurochs attacks, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each other attacking Aurochs.
mc.printedText:
Trample

mc.flavorText: One auroch may feed a village, but a herd will flatten it.

Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

Flying

Enchant creature

mc.printedText:
Enchanted creature gets +0/+2.
Sacrifice Carapace: Regenerate enchanted creature.
mc.flavorText:
"Now that's a fashion statement."
--Devin, faerie noble

mc.name: Cat Warriors
mc.oracleText: Forestwalk
mc.printedText: Forestwalk (If defending player controls any forests, this creature is unblockable.)
mc.flavorText: These stealthy felines have survived so many battles that some believe they must possess many lives.

mc.name: Chub Toad

mc.printedText: If Chub Toad blocks or is blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText:
Chub toad, chub toad
At the door.
Run away quick
Or you'll run no more.
--Traditional children's rhyme

Flying

mc.printedText:

mc.name: Craw Giant
mc.oracleText:
Trample
Rampage 2 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.)
mc.printedText: Trample; rampage 2 (For each creature assigned to block it beyond the first, this creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.)
mc.flavorText: Harthag gave a jolly laugh as he surveyed the army before him. "Ho ho ho Midgets You think you can stand in my way?"

mc.name: Craw Wurm
mc.flavorText: The most terrifying thing about the craw wurm is probably the horrible crashing sound it makes as it speeds through the forest. This noise is so loud it echoes through the trees and seems to come from all directions at once.

mc.name: Crumble
mc.oracleText: Destroy target artifact. It can't be regenerated. That artifact's controller gains life equal to its converted mana cost.
mc.printedText: Bury target artifact. That artifact's controller gains an amount of life equal to its total casting cost.
mc.flavorText:
"Ashes and dust; dust and ashes.
Hope it works before it smashes."
--Argivian children's rhyme

mc.name: Desert Twister
mc.oracleText: Destroy target permanent.
mc.printedText: Destroy target permanent.

mc.name: Durkwood Boars
mc.flavorText:
"And the unclean spirits went out, and entered the swine: and the herd ran violently . . . ."
--The Bible, Mark 5:13

mc.name: Elder Druid
mc.oracleText: {3}{G}, {T}: You may tap or untap target artifact, creature, or land.
mc.printedText: {3}{G}, {T}: Tap or untap target artifact, creature, or land.
mc.flavorText:
"Did clouds dance in his eyes,
did thorns play at his fingertips?"
--Shesul Fass, faerie band

mc.name: Elven Riders
mc.oracleText: Elven Riders can't be blocked except by Walls and/or creatures with flying.
mc.printedText: Elven Riders cannot be blocked except by Walls or creatures with flying.
mc.flavorText:
Sometimes it is better to be swift of foot than strong of swordarm.
--Elven proverb

mc.name: Elvish Archers
mc.oracleText: First strike
mc.printedText: First strike
mc.flavorText: I tell you, there was so many arrows flying about you couldn't hardly see the sun. So I says to young Angus, "Well, at least now we're fighting in the shade"

mc.name: Fog
mc.oracleText: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.
mc.printedText: Creatures deal no combat damage this turn.

mc.name: Force of Nature

Trample (If this creature would deal enough combat damage to its blockers to destroy them, you may have it deal the rest of its damage to defending player.)

mc.printedText:
Trample
During your upkeep, pay {G}{G}{G}{G} or Force of Nature deals 8 damage to you.
mc.flavorText:
"It blinked, and flower petals fell like tears. Harthar, sensing weakness, attacked--and his blood fell like petals."
--Shesul Fass, faerie bard

mc.name: Foxfire
mc.oracleText:
Untap target attacking creature. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by that creature this turn.

mc.flavorText:
"Only the foolish fear foxfire."
--Kolbjorn,
Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

mc.name: Fungusaur
mc.oracleText: Whenever Fungusaur is dealt damage, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
mc.printedText: At the end of any turn in which Fungusaur was damaged, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
mc.flavorText: Rather than sheltering her young, the female fungusaur often injures her own offspring, thereby ensuring their rapid growth.

mc.name: Fyndhorn Elder
mc.oracleText: {T}: Add {G}{G} to your mana pool.
mc.printedText: {T}: Add {G}{G} to your mana pool. Play this ability as a mana source.
mc.flavorText:
"Do we know what we're doing? Yes--the will of Freyalise."
--Laina of the Elvish Council

mc.name: Ghazbán Ogre

mc.printedText: During your upkeep, if a player has more life than any other, he or she gains control of Ghazban Ogre.
mc.flavorText:
"We were holding our own--until the ogre guiding us suddenly grinned and turned on our commander."
--Ivra Jursdotter, Sarpadian mercenary

mc.name: Giant Growth
mc.oracleText: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

mc.name: Giant Spider
mc.oracleText: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
mc.printedText: Giant Spider can block creatures with flying.
mc.flavorText: While it possesses potent venom, the giant spider often chooses not to paralyze its victims. Perhaps the creature enjoys the gentle rocking motion caused by its captives' struggles to escape its web.

mc.name: Grizzly Bears
mc.flavorText: Don't try to outrun one of Dominaria's grizzlies; it'll catch you, knock you down, and eat you. Of course, you could run up a tree. In that case you'll get a nice view before it knocks the tree down and eats you.

mc.name: Hungry Mist
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Hungry Mist unless you pay {G}{G}.
mc.printedText: During your upkeep, pay {G}{G} or bury Hungry Mist.
mc.flavorText:
"All things must eat, after all. Even the air can hunger."
--Gemma, Willow priestess

mc.name: Hurricane
mc.oracleText: Hurricane deals X damage to each creature with flying and each player.
mc.printedText: Hurricane deals X damage to each creature with flying and each player.
mc.flavorText:
"The raging winds . . . , settling on the sea, the surges sweep, / Raise liquid mountains, and disclose the deep."
--Virgil, Aeneid, Book I, trans. Dryden

mc.name: Instill Energy
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature

{0}: Untap enchanted creature. Play this ability only during your turn and only once each turn.
mc.printedText:
Enchanted creature is unaffected by summoning sickness.
{0}: Untap enchanted creature. Use this ability only during your turn and only once each turn.

mc.name: Ironroot Treefolk
mc.flavorText:
"--'I'll show you how to handle the treefolk' the giant bragged, and he strode off into the forest. Two days later he returned, his face masked in sap and a nest behind his ear. None dared ask who won."
--Azeworai, "The Treeling"

mc.name: Johtull Wurm
mc.oracleText: Whenever Johtull Wurm becomes blocked, it gets -2/-1 until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.
mc.printedText: For each creature assigned to block it beyond the first, Johtull Wurm gets -2/-1 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText:

--Taaveti of Kelsinko, elvish hunter

Flying
{G}: Killer Bees gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
Flying
{G}: +1/+1 until end of turn
mc.flavorText: The communal mind produces a savage strategy, yet no one could predict that this vicious crossbreed would unravel the secret of steel.

mc.name: Ley Druid
mc.oracleText: {T}: Untap target land.
mc.printedText: {T}: Untap target land.
mc.flavorText: After years of training, the druid becomes one with nature, drawing power from the land and returning it when needed.

--Saffi Eriksdotter, last words

mc.flavorText:

mc.flavorText:
"And the seraphs sob at vermin fangs

--Edgar Allan Poe, "The Conqueror Wurm"

mc.printedText: Search your library for a forest card and put that card into play. Shuffle your library afterwards.
mc.flavorText:
"It is in our nature to recognize beauty, but to repeat it--ah, that is another feat altogether."
--Hannah of Verdura

mc.name: Pradesh Gypsies

mc.printedText: {1}{G}, {T}: Target creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText:
"A mysterious people indeed. Their origins are as secret as their traditions."
--Lord Magnus of Llanowar

mc.printedText: During each player's upkeep, Primal Order deals to that player an amount of damage equal to the number of nonbasic lands he or she controls.
mc.flavorText:
"My sorrow: to dream of simple times, and wake in mine . . . ."
--Ola DaRiol, "Regrets"

mc.name: Rabid Wombat

Vigilance

mc.printedText:
Attacking does not cause Rabid Wombat to tap.

mc.name: Radjan Spirit
mc.oracleText: {T}: Target creature loses flying until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {T}: Target creature loses flying until end of turn.
mc.flavorText:
"Crawing, crawing,
For my crowse crawing,
I lost the best feather i' my wing
For my crowse crawing."
--Anonymous Scottish ballad

mc.name: Regeneration
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature (Target a creature as you play this. This card comes into play attached to that creature.)
{G}: Regenerate enchanted creature. (The next time that creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)
mc.printedText: {G}: Regenerate enchanted creature.

mc.name: Scaled Wurm
mc.flavorText:
"Flourishing during the Ice Age, these
wurms were the bane of all Kjeldorans. Their great size and ferocity made them the subject of countless nightmares--they embodied the worst of the Ice Age."
--Kjeldor: Ice Civilization

mc.name: Scavenger Folk
mc.oracleText: {G}, {T}, Sacrifice Scavenger Folk: Destroy target artifact.
mc.printedText: {G}, {T}, Sacrifice Scavenger Folk: Destroy target artifact.
mc.flavorText:
"Stoop, pick, turn, toss.
This is the way we mourn our loss."
--Scavenger dirge

mc.name: Scryb Sprites
mc.oracleText: Flying
mc.printedText: Flying
mc.flavorText: The only sound was the gentle clicking of the faeries' wings. Then those intruders who were still standing turned and fled. One thing was certain: they didn't think the Scryb were very funny anymore.

mc.name: Shanodin Dryads
mc.oracleText: Forestwalk
mc.printedText: Forestwalk (If defending player controls any forests, this creature is unblockable.)
mc.flavorText: Moving without sound, swift figures pass through branches and undergrowth completely unhindered. One with the trees around them, the dryads of Shanodin Forest are seen only when they wish to be.

mc.name: Shrink
mc.oracleText: Target creature gets -5/-0 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Target creature gets -5/-0 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText:
"May you decrease like coal upon the hearth . . . Evaporate like water in a pail, Become as little as a linseed-grain . . . And so diminish that you come to nothing."
--Anglo-Saxon curse

mc.name: Stampede
mc.oracleText: Attacking creatures get +1/+0 and gain trample until end of turn.
mc.printedText: All attacking creatures get +1/+0 and gain trample until end of turn.
mc.flavorText:
"When are beasts like a river?"
--The One Thousand Questions

mc.name: Stream of Life
mc.oracleText: Target player gains X life.
mc.printedText: Target player gains X life.

mc.name: Sylvan Library
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of your draw step, you may draw two cards. If you do, choose two cards in your hand drawn this turn. For each of those cards, pay 4 life or put the card on top of your library.
mc.printedText: {0}: Draw two cards, then choose any two cards in your hand drawn this turn. For each of those cards, pay 4 life or put that card back on top of your library. Use this ability only during your draw phase and only once each turn.

mc.name: Tarpan
mc.oracleText: When Tarpan is put into a graveyard from play, you gain 1 life.
mc.printedText: If Tarpan is put into any graveyard from play, gain 1 life.
mc.flavorText:
"A good tarpan will serve you, faithful and true. A bad one will kick you in the head."
--General Jarkeld, the Arctic Fox

mc.name: Thicket Basilisk
mc.oracleText: Whenever Thicket Basilisk blocks or becomes blocked by a non-Wall creature, destroy that creature at end of combat.
mc.printedText: If Thicket Basilisk blocks or is blocked by any non-Wall creature, destroy that creature at end of combat.
mc.flavorText: Moss-covered statues littered the area, a macabre monument to the basilisk's terrible power.

mc.name: Titania's Song
mc.oracleText: Each noncreature artifact loses its abilities and becomes an artifact creature with power and toughness each equal to its converted mana cost. If Titania's Song leaves play, this effect continues until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Each noncreature artifact loses its abilities and is an artifact creature with power and toughness each equal to its total casting cost. If Titania's Song leaves play, this effect continues until end of turn.

mc.name: Tranquility
mc.oracleText: Destroy all enchantments.
mc.printedText: Destroy all enchantments.

mc.printedText: Destroy all islands.

mc.name: Untamed Wilds
mc.oracleText: Search your library for a basic land card and put that card into play. Then shuffle your library.
mc.printedText: Search your library for a basic land card and put that card into play. Shuffle your library afterwards.

mc.name: Venom
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature blocks or becomes blocked by a non-Wall creature, destroy the other creature at end of combat.
mc.printedText: If enchanted creature blocks or is blocked by any non-Wall creature, destroy that creature at end of combat.
mc.flavorText:
"I told him it was just a flesh wound, but the next time I looked at him, poor Tadhg was dead and gone."
--Maeveen O'Donagh,
Memoirs of a Soldier

mc.name: Verduran Enchantress
mc.oracleText: Whenever you play an enchantment spell, you may draw a card.
mc.printedText: {0}: Draw a card. Use this ability only when you successfully cast an enchantment spell and only once for each such spell.
mc.flavorText:
"Weave the magic so that it sings to you, and will always fly home . . . ."
--Verduran teaching

mc.name: Wall of Brambles
mc.oracleText:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{G}: Regenerate Wall of Brambles.
mc.printedText: {G}: Regenerate
mc.flavorText:
Sleeping in brambles
--Elven phrase meaning
"plagued by guilt"

mc.name: Wanderlust
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, Wanderlust deals 1 damage to that player.
mc.printedText: During the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, Wanderlust deals 1 damage to him or her.
mc.flavorText:
"How terrible to wander wishing only to escape oneself."
--Taysir

mc.name: War Mammoth
mc.oracleText: Trample
mc.printedText: Trample
mc.flavorText: I didn't think mammoths could ever hold a candle to a well-trained battle horse. Then one day I turned my back on a drunken soldier. His blow never landed; Mi'cha flung the brute over ten meters.

mc.name: Whirling Dervish
mc.oracleText:
Protection from black
At end of turn, if Whirling Dervish dealt damage to an opponent this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
mc.printedText:
Protection from black
If Whirling Dervish damages any opponent, put a +1/+1 counter on it at end of turn.

mc.name: Wild Growth
mc.oracleText:
Enchant land
Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds {G} to his or her mana pool.
mc.printedText: Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, it produces an additional {G}.

mc.oracleText: Tap X target creatures. Winter Blast deals 2 damage to each of those creatures with flying.
mc.printedText: Tap X target creatures. Winter Blast deals 2 damage to each of those creatures with flying.
mc.flavorText:
"Blow, winds, and crack your cheeks rage blow"
--William Shakespeare, King Lear

mc.name: Wolverine Pack
mc.oracleText: Rampage 2 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.)
mc.printedText: Rampage 2 (For each creature assigned to block it beyond the first, this creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.)
mc.flavorText:
"Give them great meals of beef and iron and steel, they will eat like wolves and fight like devils."
--William Shakespeare, King Henry V

mc.name: Wyluli Wolf
mc.oracleText: {T}: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {T}: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText:
"When one wolf calls, others follow.
Who wants to fight creatures that eat scorpions?"
--Maimun al-Wyluli, diary

mc.name: Ambush Party

mc.printedText:
First strike
Ambush Party is unaffected by summoning sickness.
mc.flavorText:
"Fair fight? I'll take survival over chivalry any day"
--Tor Wauki, Bandit King

mc.name: Atog
mc.oracleText: Sacrifice an artifact: Atog gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Sacrifice an artifact: +2/+2 until end of turn
mc.flavorText: The bane of all artificers, the legendary atogs devoured intricate tools to further their own twisted growth.

Trample (If this creature would deal enough damage to its blockers to destroy them, you may have it deal the rest of its damage to defending player or planeswalker.)

Trample
Ball Lightning is unaffected by summoning sickness.

mc.name: Bird Maiden
mc.oracleText: Flying
mc.printedText: Flying
mc.flavorText:
"Four things that never meet do here unite To shed my blood and to ravage my heart,
A radiant brow and tresses that beguile
And rosy cheeks and a glittering smile."
--The Arabian Nights, trans. Haddawy

mc.name: Blood Lust

mc.printedText: Brassclaw Orcs cannot be assigned to block any creature with power 2 or greater.

"Modern Sarpadia's swarming with thrulls. It's a testament to the orcs that they've survived there so long."

mc.printedText: {1}{R}{R}: Brothers of Fire deals 1 damage to target creature or player and 1 damage to you.

Enchant land
You control enchanted land.

mc.flavorText:
"Every field watered in warriors' blood is sacred ground. Lay it not to waste, but claim it for our own--for glory, and for Stromgald"

Flying

Flying

mc.printedText: Dwarven Catapult deals X damage divided evenly, rounded down, among all creatures target opponent controls.

"Orc must die / Orc must die / Not an orc? / March on by."

mc.printedText: Earthquake deals X damage to each creature without flying and each player.

Enchant creature

"There is no shame in solitude. The lone knight may succeed where a hundred founder."

mc.name: Eternal Warrior

Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has vigilance.
mc.printedText: Attacking does not cause enchanted creature to tap.

Flying
{R}: Fire Drake gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Play this ability only once each turn.
mc.printedText:
Flying
{R}: +1/+0 until end of turn. You cannot spend more than {R} in this way each turn.

Fireball deals X damage divided evenly, rounded down, among any number of target creatures and/or players.

mc.name: Firebreathing
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature (Target a creature as you play this. This card comes into play attached to that creature.)
{R}: Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {R}: Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText:
"And topples round the dreary west

--Alfred, Lord Tennyson,
"In Memoriam"

mc.oracleText: {R}: Flame Spirit gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {R}: +1/+0 until end of turn

Flare deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

mc.flavorText: The secret of destruction is simple: everything burns.

mc.oracleText: Destroy all Plains.
mc.printedText: Destroy all plains.

mc.name: Game of Chaos
mc.oracleText: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, you gain 1 life and target opponent loses 1 life, and you decide whether to flip again. If you lose the flip, you lose 1 life and that opponent gains 1 life, and that player decides whether to flip again. Double the life stakes with each flip.
mc.printedText: Flip a coin; target opponent calls heads or tails while coin is in the air. The loser of the flip loses 1 life. The winner of the flip gains 1 life and may choose to repeat the process. Double the stakes each time.

mc.name: Giant Strength
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.
mc.printedText: Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.
mc.flavorText:
"O it is excellent / To have a giant's strength, but it is tyrannous / To use it like a giant."
--William Shakespeare,
Measure for Measure

mc.name: Goblin Digging Team
mc.oracleText: {T}, Sacrifice Goblin Digging Team: Destroy target Wall.
mc.printedText: {T}, Sacrifice Goblin Digging Team: Destroy target Wall.
mc.flavorText:
"From down here we can make the whole wall collapse"
"Uh, yeah, boss, but how do we get out?"

mc.name: Goblin Hero
mc.flavorText:
"When you're a goblin, you don't have to step forward to be a hero--everyone else just has to step back"
--Biggum Flodrot, goblin veteran

mc.name: Goblin King
mc.oracleText: Other Goblin creatures get +1/+1 and have mountainwalk. (They're unblockable as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)
mc.printedText: All Goblins get +1/+1 and gain mountainwalk. (If defending player controls any mountains, these creatures are unblockable.)
mc.flavorText: To be king, Numsgil did in Blog, who did in Unkful, who did in Viddle, who did in Loll, who did in Alrok . . . .

mc.name: Goblin War Drums
mc.oracleText: Each creature you control can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.
mc.printedText: Each creature you control cannot be blocked by only one creature.
mc.flavorText:
"Goblins charge with a deafening war cry. The cry doesn't mean anything--it just drowns out the drums"
--Reod Dai, mercenary

mc.name: Goblin Warrens
mc.oracleText: {2}{R}, Sacrifice two Goblins: Put three 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens into play.
mc.printedText: {2}{R}, Sacrifice two Goblins: Put three Goblin tokens into play. Treat these tokens as 1/1 red creatures.
mc.flavorText:
"Goblins bred underground, their numbers hidden from the enemy until it was too late."
--Sarpadian Empires, vol. IV

mc.name: Hill Giant
mc.flavorText: Fortunately, hill giants have large blind spots in which a human can easily hide. Unfortunately, these blind spots are beneath the bottoms of their feet.

mc.name: Hurloon Minotaur
mc.flavorText: The minotaurs of the Hurloon Mountains are known for their love of battle. They are also known for their hymns to the dead, sung for friend and foe alike. These hymns can last for days, filling the mountain valleys with their low, haunting sounds.

mc.name: Imposing Visage
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.
mc.printedText: Enchanted creature cannot be blocked by only one creature.
mc.flavorText: With the horrible mask, Lagfrak the Low terrorized the countryside. But then he met Il-Chunt, the mask's model . . . .

mc.name: Incinerate
mc.oracleText: Incinerate deals 3 damage to target creature or player. A creature dealt damage this way can't be regenerated this turn.
mc.printedText: Incinerate deals 3 damage to target creature or player. Creatures damaged by Incinerate cannot regenerate this turn.
mc.flavorText:
"Yes, I think --'toast' is an appropriate description."
--Jaya Ballard, task mage

mc.name: Inferno
mc.oracleText: Inferno deals 6 damage to each creature and each player.
mc.printedText: Inferno deals 6 damage to each creature and player.
mc.flavorText:
"Some have said there is no subtlety to destruction. You know what? They're dead."
--Jaya Ballard, task mage

mc.name: Ironclaw Curse
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -0/-1.
Enchanted creature can't block creatures with power equal to or greater than the enchanted creature's toughness.
mc.printedText: Enchanted creature gets -0/-1 and cannot be assigned to block any creature with power greater than or equal to enchanted creature's toughness.

mc.oracleText: Ironclaw Orcs can't block creatures with power 2 or greater.
mc.printedText: Ironclaw Orcs cannot be assigned to block any creature with power 2 or greater.

mc.printedText: Bury all artifacts, creatures, and lands.
mc.flavorText:
"The raging waters had swept away trees, bridges, and even houses. My healers had much work to do."
--Halvor Arenson, Kjeldoran priest

mc.name: Keldon Warlord
mc.oracleText: Keldon Warlord's power and toughness are each equal to the number of non-Wall creatures you control.
mc.printedText: Keldon Warlord has power and toughness each equal to the number of non-Wall creatures you control.
mc.flavorText: What if they threw a war, and everybody came?

mc.printedText: You and target opponent each flip a coin. Mana Clash deals 1 damage to each player whose coin comes up tails. Repeat this process until both players' coins come up heads at the same time.

mc.oracleText: Whenever a player taps a land for mana, that player adds one mana of that type to his or her mana pool.
mc.printedText: Whenever any player taps a land for mana, it produces one additional mana of the same type.

mc.name: Manabarbs
mc.oracleText: Whenever a player taps a land for mana, Manabarbs deals 1 damage to that player.
mc.printedText: Whenever any player taps a land for mana, Manabarbs deals 1 damage to him or her.

mc.name: Mons's Goblin Raiders
mc.flavorText: The intricate dynamics of Rundvelt goblin affairs are often confused with anarchy. The chaos, however, is the chaos of a thundercloud, and direction will sporadically and violently appear. Pashalik Mons and his raiders are the thunderhead that leads in the storm.

mc.name: Mountain Goat
mc.oracleText: Mountainwalk
mc.printedText: Mountainwalk (If defending player controls any mountains, this creature is unblockable.)
mc.flavorText:
"Folklore has it that to capture a mountain goat is a sign of divine blessing. I just know it's a sign that dinner is on the way."
--Klazina Jansdotter,
Leader of the Order of the Sacred Torch

mc.name: Orcish Artillery

mc.printedText: {T}: Orcish Artillery deals 2 damage to target creature or player and 3 damage to you.
mc.flavorText: In a rare display of ingenuity, the orcs invented an incredibly destructive weapon. Most orcish artillerists are those who dared criticize its effectiveness.

mc.oracleText:
Whenever City of Brass becomes tapped, it deals 1 damage to you.
{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
mc.printedText:

mc.name: Dwarven Hold
mc.oracleText:
Dwarven Hold comes into play tapped.

You may choose not to untap Dwarven Hold during your untap step.

At the beginning of your upkeep, if Dwarven Hold is tapped, put a storage counter on it.

{T}, Remove any number of storage counters from Dwarven Hold: Add {R} to your mana pool for each storage counter removed this way.
mc.printedText:
Dwarven Hold comes into play tapped.
You may choose not to untap Dwarven Hold during your untap phase and put a storage counter on it instead.
{T}, Remove X storage counters from Dwarven Hold: Add an amount of {R} equal to X to your mana pool.

mc.name: Ice Floe
mc.oracleText:
You may choose not to untap Ice Floe during your untap step.
{T}: Tap target creature without flying that's attacking you. It doesn't untap during its controller's untap step as long as Ice Floe remains tapped.
mc.printedText:
You may choose not to untap Ice Floe during your untap phase.
{T}: Tap target creature without flying that is attacking you. As long as Ice Floe remains tapped, that creature does not untap during its controller's untap phase.
